snippet: Stevie Johnson, Buffalo’s only established receiver, pulled up on a route at practice, and Bills Coach Doug Marrone said he did not know the severity of the injury.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Buffalo Bills receiver Stevie Johnson leaves practice after injuring his left hamstring; other football news noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and BILL PENNINGTON

lead_paragraph: Stevie Johnson, Buffalo’s only established receiver, pulled up on a route at practice, and Bills Coach Doug Marrone said he did not know the severity of the injury.

headline.main: Bills Star Leaves Field After Injuring Hamstring
headline.print_headline: Bills Star Leaves Field After Injuring Hamstring
